title: Lost skins
body:
I was in champ select and chose varus, i went to choose heartseeker varus, a skin i bought a while ago, and notice it says 'unlock this skin' and i couldnt play the game with this skin, this has happened with my Artic ops varus, Heartseeker varus and dark star varus skins, all skins i bought myself and were not gifted.
I did use prepaid cards to pay for these skins, is that the reason why?

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and we'd be happy to provide more context individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission.  Reach out to us there, and we'll let you know what's up.  We'll reply asap!
